label: Is the room correctly allocated to the operator and does it match the assigned Manual Pack?
Have all required equipment types i.e. Label Printer, SU Printer, Roll Printer, Workstation, Workcenter and Manual Pack been scanned and verified as working and online?
Has the operator read and acknowledged the safety guidelines for printer usage to prevent hazards?
Is the job assigned to the room active and does it correspond with the current packaging activity?
Does the physical equipment layout match the system configuration and follow the logical packaging workflow?
Have the operator's credentials been validated using the credential screen (Scan Code & Password)?
Is there sufficient label stock loaded in both the SU and label printers before proceeding?
Have the Kit and/or SU barcodes been tested for readability to ensure accurate tracking during the process?
Has the packaging area, including workstation and equipment surfaces been cleaned and sanitized before use?
Are the emergency stop button and alert signals (for errors or hazards) tested and functioning properly?
